questions.text: Assertion: In a network using pure flooding, a packet originating from a node will reach every other node in the network exactly once. Reason: Pure flooding ensures that each node forwards the packet only on links where it has not been previously transmitted, preventing loops and duplicates.
Match the FTP commands with their primary purposes.
right: Changes the current working directory on the server
Requests the server to enter passive mode for data transfer

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a primary factor contributing to switching delay in a network switch? Answer: _______
